TITLE Creamy Zucchini Sauce
{[ Zucchini]
# Preheat the oven to 400F.
# Mix [2 lbs zucchini cubed], [3 tbl olive oil], and [1 tbl paprika]. Add [salt] and [pepper] to taste.
# Spread onto a large baking tray. Bake for about 20 minutes, until soft and slightly browned.
}
{[Pasta, optional]
# Prepare [pasta] or other base of choice if desired.
}
{[Sauce]
# Combine: [1 cup sour cream], [2 cloves garlic [minced]], [1 tbl tomato paste], and [2 tbl [chopped] basil] in a medium skillet, stir, and bring to a simmer. Turn off the heat.
# Add the baked zucchini to the cream-sauce and mix everything well.
# Serve over $[pasta], if desired.
# Garnish with chopped herbs, if desired.
}
